description: A technical fit paired with a highly protective fabric, the Black Diamond Alpenglow Crew offers coverage on desert multi pitches, high-alpine approaches and hot crag sessions. Featuring UPF 50+ and BD.cool mineral based in fiber cooling technology, this fabric reflects 71% of near-infrared rays and reduces the wearer’s temperature. A layer of protection to your arsenal, with a pullover design, plus Polygiene odor control, the Alpenglow Crew offers the ultimate in performance and long-wearing comfort.
name: Black Diamond Alpenglow LS Crew - Mens

specs.value: Polyester Stretch Textured Knit - 87% Polyester, 13% Elastane, 200gsm
